title: [Large-Scale] Innovative Mathematics Instructional Design Strategies in Electronic Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mathematics education theories and experience in traditional instructional design
context.additional_context: A corporate teacher re-education program applying digital learning environments aligned with the latest educational standards.

learning_goals: Participants can apply at least three types of digital educational tools that enhance learner engagement to actual lesson designs.
Participants can create multimedia instructional materials for delivering math concepts in a blended learning environment.
Participants can design learning outcome analysis and feedback systems using an LMS-based assessment system.
Participants can develop strategies to resolve digital content compatibility issues for math education in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
